2.description: Хэрэглэгчид дараагийн хуудас руу шилжих боломжтойг харуулсан amp-story hint UI дээрх шошго.

3.description: Хэрэглэгчид өмнөх хуудас руу шилжих боломжтойг харуулсан amp-story hint UI дээрх шошго.

4.string: Холбоосыг түр санах ойд хуулж чадсангүй :(
4.description: String shown in a failure message to inform the user that a link could not be successfully copied to their clipboard.

5.description: String shown in a confirmation message to inform the user that a link was successfully copied to their clipboard.

6.description: Button label for the share target that shares a link via email.

7.description: Button label for the share target that shares a link via Facebook.

8.description: Button label for the share target that shares a link via Google+.

9.description: Button label for the share target that shares a link via by copying it to the user's clipboard.

10.description: Button label for the share target that shares a link via LinkedIn.

11.description: Button label for the share target that shares a link via Pinterest.

12.description: Button label for the share target that shares a link via SMS.

13.description: Button label for the share target that shares a link via deferral to the operating system's native sharing handler.

14.description: Button label for the share target that shares a link via Tumblr.

15.description: Button label for the share target that shares a link via Twitter.

16.description: Button label for the share target that shares a link via WhatsApp.

18.string: Энэ хэрэглээг харахын тулд цонхоо өндөр, өргөнөөр нь дэлгэнэ үү
18.description: Text for a warning screen that informs the user that stories are only supported in larger browser windows.

19.string: Та энэ контентыг харахын тулд amp түүхийн туршилтыг идэвхжүүлэх ёстой.
19.description: Text for a warning screen that informs the user that they must enable an experiment to use stories.

20.string: Хуудсыг босоо горимд харахад хамгийн тохиромжтой
20.description: Text for a warning screen that informs the user that stories are only supported in portrait orientation.

21.string: Уучлаарай, таны хөтөч энэ хэрэглээг дэмждэггүй бололтой
21.description: Text for a warning screen that informs the user that their browser does not support stories.

22.description: Label for a button that allows the user to consent to providing their cookie access.

23.description: Label for a button that allows the user to disconsent to providing their cookie access.

25.description: Label for a heading of a dialog that shows the user the domain from which the story is served.

26.description: Label for a link to documentation on how AMP links are handled.

27.description: Button label to allow the user to continue even if they are not using a supportive browser.

31.description: Text that informs users that the sound is off after they click the mute button

32.description: Text that informs users that the sound is on after they click the unmute button on a page with sound

33.description: Text that informs users that the sound is on after they click the unmute button on a page without sound

34.description: Label for a button to play the video visible on the page.

35.description: Label for a button to open a drawer containing additional content via a "swipe up" user gesture.

36.description: Label in the tooltip text for when a Twitter embed is expandable.

37.string: Энэ хэрэглээг харахын тулд цонхоо өндрөөр нь дэлгэнэ үү
37.description: Text for a warning screen that informs the user that stories are only supported in taller browser windows.

38.string: Энэ хэрэглээг харахын тулд цонхоо өргөнөөр нь дэлгэнэ үү
38.description: Text for a warning screen that informs the user that stories are only supported in wider browser windows.

62.description: Checkbox label when the branching experiment is turned on  and the story is in landscape mode; checking the checkbox lets the user share the story from the current page.

63.description: Button label for the share target that shares a link via Line.

64.description: Label that indicates that additional content has been added to a story

65.description: Label indicating that the video visible on the page failed to play.

66.description: Label for the mute button that turns off the sound in the story

67.description: Label for the unmute button that turns the sound in the story back on

68.description: Label for the information button that pulls up relevant information about the story content

69.description: Label for the share button that pulls up a panel of options for sharing the story

70.description: Label for the sidebar button that pulls up a menu of options for interacting with the story

71.description: Label for the first answer choice from a multiple choice quiz (e.g. A in A/B/C/D)

72.description: Label for the second answer choice from a multiple choice quiz (e.g. B in A/B/C/D)

73.description: Label for the third answer choice from a multiple choice quiz (e.g. C in A/B/C/D)

74.description: Label for the fourth answer choice from a multiple choice quiz (e.g. D in A/B/C/D)

75.description: Label for a hint indicating progress on a multistep onboarding user education tutorial.

76.string: Дараагийн дэлгэц рүү очих бол товшино уу
76.description: Instruction on how to use the product, within an onboarding user education tutorial.

77.description: Label for a button dismissing or advancing to the next step of an onboarding user education tutorial.

78.description: Label for a hint indicating progress on a multistep onboarding user education tutorial.

79.string: Дараагийн түүх рүү очих бол шударна уу
79.description: Instruction on how to use the product, within an onboarding user education tutorial.

80.description: Label for a button dismissing or advancing to the next step of an onboarding user education tutorial.

81.description: Label for a hint in the context of an onboarding user education tutorial.

82.description: Label indicating that users can navigate to the previous page.

83.description: Label for the activate button to ask for device orientation permission

84.description: Label for the results component preceding the score in percentages

85.description: Label for a button that pauses the media content on the story

86.description: Label for a button that plays the media content on the story

87.description: Label for a button that closes the full page experience and takes the user back to where they were originally

88.description: Label for a button that advances to the next element in the carousel

89.description: Text displayed to users after clicking a button that reveals a disclaimer, telling them more about where their user data will be stored, after they interact with a poll or quiz.

90.description: Label for a button that advances to the next element in the carousel.

91.description: Label for a button that advances to the next page of the story.

92.description: Label for a button that replays the story.

93.description: Label for a button that returns the user to the previous page of the story.

96.description: Text displayed to users on gyroscope activation of an amp-story-360 component, telling them to move their device to experience the gyroscope effect.

97.description: Text displayed to users on tap of outlink button.
